00304 #define SUPPL_MERGE_MASK            ((0x7f << SUPPL_LSB_OP)        | \
00305                                      (0x1  << SUPPL_LSB_ROOT)      | \
00306                                      (0x1  << SUPPL_LSB_EXECUTED)  | \

00488 #define EXP_OP_STATIC     0x0   
00489 #define EXP_OP_SIG        0x1   
00490 #define EXP_OP_XOR        0x2   
00491 #define EXP_OP_MULTIPLY   0x3   
00492 #define EXP_OP_DIVIDE     0x4   
00493 #define EXP_OP_MOD        0x5

00495 #define EXP_OP_SUBTRACT   0x7

00498 #define EXP_OP_NAND       0xa   
00499 #define EXP_OP_NOR        0xb   
00500 #define EXP_OP_NXOR       0xc

00504 #define EXP_OP_RSHIFT     0x10

00510 #define EXP_OP_CNE        0x16  
00511 #define EXP_OP_LOR        0x17  
00512 #define EXP_OP_LAND       0x18  
00513 #define EXP_OP_COND       0x19  
00514 #define EXP_OP_COND_SEL   0x1a

00516 #define EXP_OP_UAND       0x1c  
00517 #define EXP_OP_UNOT       0x1d

00526 #define EXP_OP_CONCAT     0x26  
00527 #define EXP_OP_PEDGE      0x27  
00528 #define EXP_OP_NEDGE      0x28  
00529 #define EXP_OP_AEDGE      0x29  
00530 #define EXP_OP_LAST       0x2a  
00531 #define EXP_OP_EOR        0x2b  
00532 #define EXP_OP_DELAY      0x2c  
00533 #define EXP_OP_CASE       0x2d  
00534 #define EXP_OP_CASEX      0x2e  
00535 #define EXP_OP_CASEZ      0x2f  
00536 #define EXP_OP_DEFAULT    0x30  
00537 #define EXP_OP_LIST       0x31  
00538 #define EXP_OP_PARAM      0x32  
00539 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT 0x33  
00540 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT 0x34  
00547 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00548                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00549                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00550                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00551                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00552                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00553                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00554                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00555                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00556                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00557                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00558                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00559                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND)) && \
00560                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00561 
00566 #define EXPR_EVAL_STATIC(x)      (((((x->left != NULL) && (SUPPL_OP( x->left->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC))            || \
00567                                     ((x->left != NULL) && (SUPPL_WAS_EXECUTED( x->left->suppl ) == 1))  || \
00568                                     (x->left == NULL))                                                                && \
00569                                    (((x->right != NULL) && (SUPPL_OP( x->right->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC))          || \
00570                                     ((x->right != NULL) && (SUPPL_WAS_EXECUTED( x->right->suppl ) == 1)) || \
00571                                     (x->right == NULL))                                                               && \
00572                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00573                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) && \
00574                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL) && \
00575                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC)   && \
00576                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_SIG)      && \
00577                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST)     && \
00578                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT)  && \
00579                                    (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00580 
00585 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE( x ) & \
00586                                     ~EXPR_EVAL_STATIC( x ) & \
00587                                     (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE( x->suppl ) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE( x->suppl )))
